dialogues.speaker: BACK TO JASON
dialogues.text: AS he tightens his grip around Delongpre's neck. He can't RIZZO is fighting to untangle her harness. We can hear Delongpre CHOKING over the radio. The three are spinning even closer and closer towards EAR Then, Rizzo reaches down. She grabs Delongpre's leg and C on her sleeve.

dialogues.text: But he's still tangled in Rizzo's hoses. And now she has Jason turns...grabs the hoses and begins pulling himself toward Rizzo and Delongpre. He has them...when --

dialogues.text: Still barely alive barrels into Jason, vlinging to his ba He turns, slashes with his knife and severs the hoses. Jason and Brodski tumble towards EARTH II.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rizzo's turning blue. She's about to pass out, when -- Delongpre pulls a hose from his suit and hooks it into he CHSHSHSH... AIR BEGINS TO FLOW. Rizzo takes a big GASP...coughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (breathing steadily)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh great...yeah, having a great time, and you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Hello? A little assistance here? They turn to see Kay-Em's head floating close by. Thorgan and pulls her head into his arms. THE GROUP CHEERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay-em you okay?

dialogues.text: I am now. I missed you, Thorgan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I missed you too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love you. Those two aren't the only two.

dialogues.speaker: RIZZO AND DELONGPRE
dialogues.text: Their glass face masks are touching. They stare into each eyes.

dialogues.text: Chinese, huh? They laugh and turn to stare toward EARTH II.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Jason's body comes into view. It's racing toward Brodski riding it like Slim Pickens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeee---Haaaaa!! Slowly they begin entering the atmosphere. Immediately Brodski is engulfed in flames and is gone. He man...stay to the end to make sure the job was done right Spread eagle and alone, facing the planet below, Jason co descent. His fingers wiggle as his chrome mask begins to heat up. It begins to glow. His metallic arm and leg glow. Flames build as he rockets towards Earth II. Flesh BUBBLES and OOZES. His legs and arms begin to flail as hunks of burning fles body!

dialogues.text: Four kids sit on futuristic sleeping bags around an old f campfire.

dialogues.text: Hey! Check that out! They look up and see a blaze shooting towards Earth II.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A falling star!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a meteor dickhead.

dialogues.text: Cool!!! From the explosion, one small smoldering chunk falls towa

dialogues.text: As the chunk falls closer and closer we see that it is a hockey mask! IT HITS THE WATER with a SSSSS!!!!

dialogues.text: Let's go check it out! The others agree as they grab their flashlights and head could be a wonderful new discovery.
